reporting-org.narrative: Bundesministerium für wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung (BMZ)
Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ)

title.narrative: Supporting scaling up in nutrition to reduce stunting in Malawi
Vorhaben gegen chronische Mangelernährung bei Kindern

description.narrative: The aim of the plan is to reach 100% of all 461,000 households in the project area with Nutrition measures (Scaling up Nutrition - SUN as well as Nutrition Education and Communication Strategy - NECS) - 504,000 children less than 5 years, of it 100,000 children less than 2 years, 148,000 pregnant and 133,000 breastfeeding women.

Ziel des Vorhabens ist, 100% aller 461.000 Haushalte im Projektgebiet mit Nutrition-Maßnahmen (Scaling up Nutrition - SUN sowie Nutrition Education and Communication Strategy – NECS) zu erreichen - 504.000 Kinder unter 5 Jahren, davon 100.000 Kinder unter 2 Jahren, 148.000 schwangere und 133.000 stillende Frauen.

The aim of the plan is to reach 100% of all 461,000 households in the project area with Nutrition measures (Scaling up Nutrition - SUN as well as Nutrition Education and Communication Strategy - NECS) - 504,000 children less than 5 years, of it 100,000 children less than 2 years, 148,000 pregnant and 133,000 breastfeeding women.

Ziel des Vorhabens ist, 100% aller 461.000 Haushalte im Projektgebiet mit Nutrition-Maßnahmen (Scaling up Nutrition - SUN sowie Nutrition Education and Communication Strategy – NECS) zu erreichen - 504.000 Kinder unter 5 Jahren, davon 100.000 Kinder unter 2 Jahren, 148.000 schwangere und 133.000 stillende Frauen.
